sensors

Class Sensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensors.Sensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FireSensor, HumiditySensor, MoistureSensor, PestSensor, RainSensor, SoilSensor, TemperatureSensor

    public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object

    Sensor super class for sensors

    It contains common functions which are required by the all sensors

    Author:
    Shivanagesh Chandra Feb 18, 2016 Senor.java
